idea-plugin.name: Dubbo
idea-plugin.description:
GitHub

Features

  • create dubbo+springboot project with api module and provider module quickly
  • support lots of third party dependency like mybatis,pageHelper,hikari,redis generate code example and testcase for them
  • qqGroup:796916754
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.1

  • add mavenWrapper for plugin
  • use Application as main class

1.0

  • create dubbo+springboot project quickly
  • support mybatis
  • support pageHelper
  • support lombok
  • support spring retry
  • support hikari
